death_place.en: Hall of Mental Cultivation, Forbidden City

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第六位皇帝，也是清军入关后的第四位皇帝，年号“乾隆”。他是雍正帝第四子，在位六十年，禅位后又继续以太上皇身份掌握实权近四年，是中国历史上实际掌权时间最长、最长寿的皇帝。其统治期间清朝国力达到顶峰，史称“康雍乾盛世”。同时，他也因大兴文字狱、晚期吏治腐败等问题而备受争议。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty in China, and the fourth Qing emperor to rule over China proper. His era name was 'Qianlong'. He was the fourth son of the Yongzheng Emperor. His reign of 60 years was followed by nearly four years as Emperor Emeritus (Taishang Huang) where he retained de facto power, making him the longest-reigning de facto ruler and the longest-living emperor in Chinese history. During his reign, the Qing dynasty reached its zenith, a period known as the 'High Qing era'. However, he is also controversial for promoting literary inquisitions and the political corruption in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，康熙帝第四子，乾隆帝之父。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor, and the father of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝的皇贵妃，乾隆帝的生母。
description.en: An imperial noble consort of the Yongzheng Emperor and the biological mother of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子，其母为孝仪纯皇后。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the 15th son of the Qianlong Emperor. His mother was Empress Xiaoyichun.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，在位61年，是中国历史上在位时间最长的皇帝，乾隆帝的祖父。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who reigned for 61 years, making him the longest-reigning emperor in Chinese history. He was the grandfather of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝的第一任皇后。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝的皇贵妃，嘉庆帝的生母，后被追赠为皇后。
description.en: An imperial noble consort of the Qianlong Emperor, the biological mother of the Jiaqing Emperor, and was posthumously honored as an empress.

description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆时期编修的大型丛书，是当时世界上最庞大的百科全书。
description.en: A vast collection of books compiled during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty, representing the largest encyclopedia in the world at the time.

description.zh-cn: 指清朝康熙、雍正、乾隆三位皇帝统治时期，是中国历史上国力强盛、社会稳定、经济繁荣的时期。
description.en: Refers to the period during the reigns of the Kangxi, Yongzheng, and Qianlong emperors of the Qing dynasty, a time of great power, social stability, and economic prosperity in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代统治者因言论或著作而对文人进行政治迫害的事件，在清朝乾隆时期达到顶峰。
description.en: Political persecution of intellectuals for their writings in ancient China, which peaked during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个由满族建立的封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

nodes.id: 第一代马戛尔尼伯爵乔治·马戛尔尼

zh-cn: 第一代马戛尔尼伯爵乔治·马戛尔尼

description.zh-cn: 英国外交官，于1793年率领马加尔尼使团访华，与乾隆帝会面。
description.en: A British diplomat who led the Macartney Embassy to China in 1793 and met with the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军阀，因于1928年盗掘清东陵中的乾隆裕陵和慈禧定东陵而知名。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China, known for looting the Yuling Mausoleum of Qianlong and the Dingdongling of Cixi in the Eastern Qing Tombs in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 清高宗乾隆帝的陵墓，位于清东陵。
description.en: The mausoleum of the Qianlong Emperor, located in the Eastern Qing Tombs.

description.zh-cn: 清朝雍正、乾隆时期的重要政治家、军机大臣，后被任命为辅政大臣之一。
description.en: An important statesman and Grand Councillor during the Yongzheng and Qianlong reigns, later appointed as one of the regents for the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正、乾隆三朝重臣，军机大臣，后被任命为辅政大臣之一。
description.en: A high-ranking official who served the Kangxi, Yongzheng, and Qianlong emperors, a Grand Councillor, and was later appointed as one of the regents for the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的藏传佛教寺院，原为雍正帝即位前的府邸，也是乾隆帝的出生地。
description.en: A Tibetan Buddhist temple and monastery in Beijing, formerly the residence of the Yongzheng Emperor before he ascended the throne, and the birthplace of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 孝仪纯皇后生前为皇贵妃，是嘉庆帝的生母，乾隆帝禅位后追赠其为皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaoyichun was an Imperial Noble Consort during her lifetime and the mother of the Jiaqing Emperor. She was posthumously honored as Empress after Qianlong's abdication.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝于1735年至1796年担任皇帝，后作为太上皇继续掌握实权至1799年驾崩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor reigned as Emperor from 1735 to 1796, and then continued to hold de facto power as Emperor Emeritus until his death in 1799.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝遗诏命鄂尔泰为辅政大臣，辅佐乾隆帝处理政务。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor's will appointed Ortai as a regent to assist the Qianlong Emperor in handling government affairs.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝遗诏命张廷玉为辅政大臣，辅佐乾隆帝处理政务。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor's will appointed Zhang Tingyu as a regent to assist the Qianlong Emperor in handling government affairs.

description.zh-cn: 下令编纂《四库全书》。
description.en: Ordered the compilation of the Siku Quanshu.

description.zh-cn: 为加强思想控制，大兴文字狱。
description.en: To strengthen ideological control, he greatly promoted literary inquisitions.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝的统治时期是“康雍乾盛世”的重要组成部分，将清朝的国力推向顶峰。
description.en: The reign of the Qianlong Emperor was a key component of the 'High Qing era', pushing the Qing dynasty's power to its peak.

relationships.target: 第一代马戛尔尼伯爵乔治·马戛尔尼

description.zh-cn: 接见了由乔治·马戛尔尼率领的英国使团。
description.en: Received the British embassy led by George Macartney.

description.zh-cn: 率部下盗掘了乾隆帝的陵墓清裕陵，劈开其梓棺并使其遗骸四散。
description.en: Led his troops to loot the Yuling Mausoleum of the Qianlong Emperor, breaking open his coffin and scattering his remains.

description.zh-cn: 率部下盗掘了清裕陵。
description.en: Led his troops to loot the Yuling Mausoleum.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝在位满六十年后，宣布传位于皇十五子永琰（即嘉庆帝）。
description.en: After reigning for a full sixty years, the Qianlong Emperor announced his abdication in favor of his 15th son, Yongyan (the Jiaqing Emperor).
